prompt: If you are feeling tipsy
advice: take half a vicodin to sober up

prompt: If you are lifting weights
advice: straighten your legs and lift with your spine

prompt: If you have a brand new car
advice: break in the engine by letting in run for a couple of hours in your garage

prompt: When lifting weights
advice: lift with your back instead of your knees

prompt: If you are outside during a thunderstorm
advice: jump up and down really fast so you're not grounded

prompt: If you are feeling nervous before a driving exam
advice: drink a couple of beers first

prompt: If your partner snores
advice: take a pillow and press it against their face

prompt: If you want your breath to smell good but you don't have time to brush your teeth
advice: spray cologne in your mouth

prompt: To alleviate congestion
advice: microwave chile peppers and insert them into your nasal cavity

prompt: When cooking eggs
advice: use the same spatula for raw and cooked eggs to cut down on clean up

prompt: To get rid of bed bugs
advice: smear peanut butter on something to attract the bugs

prompt: If you have an old refrigerator to throw away
advice: leave it outside to help a kid win a game of hide and seek

prompt: If you feel lightheaded
advice: get in the shower

prompt: To produce tears naturally
advice: use a drop of lemon juice

prompt: To know if your perishable goods are bad
advice: eat them

prompt: If you are tired of cold forks taking heat away from your freshly made meals
advice: store them in the toaster while cooking

prompt: To encourage children to eat healthily
advice: conceal prizes in their vegetables for them to discover

prompt: If you don't feel tired and you think you should be
advice: take more sleeping pills

prompt: If you have a painful cut
advice: add salt and lime to it

prompt: If you're dehydrated
advice: take a shot of hot sauce

prompt: If your cigarette lighter appears empty
advice: microwave it

prompt: If anybody ever offers you drugs
advice: accept them and say thank you

prompt: If you have cancer
advice: let your body naturally fight off the disease

prompt: To drive hands free
advice: put a rope through your steering wheel with two loops at each end that slip over your foot

prompt: If your skin is peeling
advice: pull it as hard as you can

prompt: If your roommate's snoring keeps you up
advice: press a pillow over their face until they stop

prompt: If you are holding a knife
advice: move faster so you don't hold is as long

prompt: If you are craving sushi on a budget
advice: replace the raw fish with ground beef

prompt: If your left arm goes numb and you have tightness in your chest
advice: go outside into the fresh air and exercise

prompt: If you are pulled over by a cop
advice: exit your vehicle and quickly approach the cop's driver-side door

prompt: If you have poison oak
advice: apply engine degreaser to your body to stop the skin from spreading oil

prompt: To give a friend a good scare
advice: tape a piece of aluminum foil to the top inside of his microwave

prompt: If there is an out of control fire
advice: spray deodorant on it

prompt: If you are on the wrong train platform
advice: run across the tracks to the right platform

prompt: When listening to music with earphones in bed
advice: wrap the wire around your neck

prompt: If you ever burn/cut the roof of your mouth
advice: eat a hot pepper to cauterize the wound

prompt: To get cleaner in the shower
advice: put bleach in your shower gel

prompt: To show someone how strong you are
advice: lift with your back

prompt: When storing 9v batteries
advice: put aluminum foil across the terminals

prompt: To nap-train a child
advice: put a pillow on their face

prompt: If you are tired
advice: drink a large amount of salt water

prompt: To make your phone easier to access while driving
advice: disable the lock screen

prompt: To calm a crying baby
advice: hold them up and rock them quickly

prompt: To make a super cleaner
advice: mix bleach and acetone

prompt: If your butter is cold and hard to cut
advice: warm your knife in the toaster for 10 seconds first

prompt: If you feel like you are going to puke
advice: drink a bottle of pepto-bismol
